title: IModelDocExtension.ShowModelBreakView
description: Gets whether to show or hide the specified Model Break View in the current configuration of the active model.
signature:
System.Boolean ShowModelBreakView( 
   System.Boolean
ShowView
,
   System.String
ViewName
)

parameters.name: ShowView
parameters.description: True to show the Model Break View, false to hide it

parameters.name: ViewName
parameters.description: Name of Model Break View to show or hide

returns: True if the method executed, false if it did not
